teamLocSec.title: Our Team is Spread Across the Continent

joinComSec.title: Join Our Community and Share your Ideas
joinComSec.describe: Game Root Smart Contract SDK facilitates game developers to implement 'one-click winding' of digital assets such as certain 'rare' game props and transactions on the Game Root platform to break the exclusiveness of transactions within a single game/platform and to revitalize players.  It brings value to game assets and time/effort put into the game and avoids “sunken costs”.  At the same time, a decentralized distribution platform based on IPFS is set up to make the distribution of game content more fair.
